name: dfsingles2

body.origin:
|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), csingles), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s0, csingles)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), csingles), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s0, csingles)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cv(s0), csingles), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| diffsc(s0, csingles)
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))

|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Singletons = { s0 | ∃(s1, s0 = { s1 })}
⊣ d(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Singletons = { s0 | ∃(s1, s0 = { s1 })}
⊣ d(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csingles, cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Singletons = { s0 | ∃(s1, s0 = { s1 })}
⊣ d(s0, s1)

comment: Alternate definition of the class of all singletons. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
